sentences.en: Cruises on the Thames in London, have become an annual attraction.
sentences.cn: 在伦敦泰晤士河上的巡航已成为一年一度的引人注目的事.

sentences.en: Eels have been on the feed in the Lower Thames.
sentences.cn: 鳗鱼在泰晤士河下游寻食.

sentences.en: He has a full order book for his boat-building yard on the Thames.
sentences.cn: 他在泰晤士河边的造船厂订单充足。

sentences.en: London, capital of Great Britain, SE England, on both sides of the Thames River.
sentences.cn: 伦敦，英国的首都，位于英格兰的东南方，泰晤士河流经这里。
很多桥横亘在泰晤士河上.

sentences.en: Please enclose your remittance, making cheques payable to Thames Valley Technology.
sentences.cn: 请附上汇款，支票收款人为泰晤士河谷科技公司。

sentences.en: Thames television announced a re-run of the Benny Hill Show.
sentences.cn: 泰晤士电视台宣布重播《班尼·希尔秀》。

sentences.en: The Dutch fleet are sailing up the Thames.
sentences.cn: 荷兰舰队向泰晤士河上游驶去.

sentences.en: The ship is now permanently moored on the Thames in London.
sentences.cn: 该船现在永久地停泊在伦敦泰晤士河边.

sentences.en: The traffic clogged the Thames bridges.
sentences.cn: 往来的车辆把泰晤士河上的桥都堵死了。

sentences.en: the turgid waters of the Thames
They're drilling a new tunnel under the Thames.
sentences.cn: 在泰晤士河河床下钻凿一条新隧道.

sentences.en: Under the impulsion of its screw the " Resolute'sailed down the Thames.
sentences.cn: 决心号在暗轮的推动下向泰 晤 士河驶去.

sentences.en: We houseboated along the Thames yesterday.
sentences.cn: 我们昨天乘居住船游览了泰晤士河的沿岸风光。

sentences.en: We live near the Thames estuary.
sentences.cn: 我们的住处靠近泰晤士河入海口.

sentences.en: We walked along the Thames embankment.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着泰晤士河的堤岸散步.
